item.title: Could anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

weaving8:

compile ok try tht dont double post.

No it isn’t okay.

Yz85Racer:

Go to line 27431 and look a few lines near or around that, and remove the extra closing brace.

I’ve looked already, no extra brackets about.

This is the code

public boolean AttackNPC() { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP; int hitDiff = 0; int Npchitdiff = 0; int wepdelay = 0; CalculateMaxHit(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); int casterX = absX; int casterY = absY; int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;

Read full topic

item.title: Could anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

Alright, i’m trying to fix the Ice Barrage spell, I’ve fixed it - Followed a tut (Not telling where I got it from)
And, it gives me this error.
Also, I scroll down a bit, and this is where I find what this code is.

public boolean AttackNPC() { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP; int hitDiff = 0; int Npchitdiff = 0; int wepdelay = 0; CalculateMaxHit(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); int casterX = absX; int casterY = absY; int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;

COMPILER ERROR:

client.java:27431: illegal start of expression public boolean AttackNPC() { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone be kind enough to tell me what i’ve done wrong? and how to fix it?

Read full topic
